Browse archive of Emily's experiments with LLMs and generative AI models exploring queerness, Cuban identity, migration, Miami culture, and living on a dying planet.

What is Unsupervised Pleasures?

We are a DIY community practice space using queer methodologies, feminist, decolonial and other non-normative approaches to create datasets, machine learning models, publications and art with AI. Stewarded by Sarah Ciston and Emily Martinez.
